prop.sql: SELECT car.*, IFNULL(sum(bt.ticket_num), 0) AS ticketNum FROM ( SELECT bc.id AS carId, bc.car_name AS carName, bc.car_no AS carNo, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT bci.img_uri SEPARATOR '|' ) AS carImgs, bcg.group_name AS carGroup, bcg.id AS carGroupId FROM biz_car_1001 bc INNER JOIN biz_car_group_1002 bcg ON bc.group_id = bcg.id AND bcg.deleteflag = 0 AND bcg.cancleflag = 0 AND bcg.holdflag = 0 LEFT JOIN biz_car_imgs_1003 bci ON bc.id = bci.car_id AND bci.img_type_id = #imgType# AND bci.deleteflag = 0 AND bci.cancleflag = 0 AND bci.holdflag = 0 WHERE bc.deleteflag = 0 AND bc.cancleflag = 0 AND bc.holdflag = 0 GROUP BY bc.id, bcg.id ORDER BY bcg.order_num, bc.car_no ) car LEFT JOIN biz_ticket_2001 bt ON car.carId = bt.click_car_id AND bt.ticket_type_id = #ticketTypeId# GROUP BY car.carId

SELECT count(1) FROM biz_car_1001 bc INNER JOIN biz_ticket_2001 bt ON bt.click_car_id = bc.id and bt.click_time > #todayTime# AND bt.from_ip = #fromIp# AND bt.ticket_type_id = #ticketTypeId# AND bt.deleteflag = 0 AND bt.cancleflag = 0 AND bt.holdflag = 0 INNER JOIN biz_car_group_1002 bcg ON bc.group_id = bcg.id AND bcg.id = #groupId# AND bcg.deleteflag = 0 AND bcg.cancleflag = 0 AND bcg.holdflag = 0 WHERE bc.deleteflag = 0 AND bc.cancleflag = 0 AND bc.holdflag = 0
